<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Holds solver state and other metadata relevant to each PBQP RA node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#aabb3b41c18912cd555ea82127da917e0">NodeMetadata</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#ad2d867b3c6a1086374664fdd467b7da4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#ad2d867b3c6a1086374664fdd467b7da4">AllowedRegVector</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/allowedregvector">RegAlloc::AllowedRegVector</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The node&#39;s reduction state. The order in this enum is important,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as it is assumed nodes can only progress up (i.e. towards being</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimally reducible) when reducing the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a76792a143d879b2328025dfc48e80e8f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a76792a143d879b2328025dfc48e80e8f">ReductionState</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    Unprocessed,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#ac05c7d03c98e19bddb708ec1a837c324">NodeMetadata</a>&amp; N1Md = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getNodeMetadata(N1Id);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#ac05c7d03c98e19bddb708ec1a837c324">NodeMetadata</a>&amp; N2Md = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getNodeMetadata(N2Id);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Transpose = N1Id != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getEdgeNode1Id(EId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Metadata are computed incrementally. First, update them</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by removing the old cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/matrixmetadata">MatrixMetadata</a>&amp; OldMMd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getEdgeCosts(EId).getMetadata();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    N1Md.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a1c74e0792948c70c031151491b34da14">handleRemoveEdge</a>(OldMMd, Transpose);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    N2Md.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a1c74e0792948c70c031151491b34da14">handleRemoveEdge</a>(OldMMd, !Transpose);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// And update now the metadata with the new cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/matrixmetadata">MatrixMetadata</a>&amp; MMd = NewCosts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/mdmatrix/#acd63ba8da2c8d08ff0fc73f840926666">getMetadata</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    N1Md.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#af604de88cfa10f1c5c955d781ee30d7a">handleAddEdge</a>(MMd, Transpose);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">    N2Md.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#af604de88cfa10f1c5c955d781ee30d7a">handleAddEdge</a>(MMd, !Transpose);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// As the metadata may have changed with the update, the nodes may have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// become ConservativelyAllocatable or OptimallyReducible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    promote(N1Id, N1Md);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">    promote(N2Id, N2Md);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> promote(NodeId NId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata">NodeMetadata</a>&amp; NMd) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getNodeDegree(NId) == 3) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This node is becoming optimally reducible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">      moveToOptimallyReducibleNodes(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NMd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#ae146313afdc8b115519ff4d5a2234729">getReductionState</a>() ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">               NodeMetadata::NotProvablyAllocatable &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">               NMd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/nodemetadata/#a50f35a8eb5e9fdd4484c4946053b67a3">isConservativelyAllocatable</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This node just became conservatively allocatable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">      moveToConservativelyAllocatableNodes(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> removeFromCurrentSet(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.getNodeMetadata(NId).getReductionState()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeMetadata::Unprocessed: </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeMetadata::OptimallyReducible:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OptimallyReducibleNodes.find(NId) !=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">             OptimallyReducibleNodes.end() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Node not in optimally reducible set.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">      OptimallyReducibleNodes.erase(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeMetadata::ConservativelyAllocatable:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.find(NId) !=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">             ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.end() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Node not in conservatively allocatable set.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.erase(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeMetadata::NotProvablyAllocatable:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.find(NId) !=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">             NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.end() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Node not in not-provably-allocatable set.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">      NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.erase(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> moveToOptimallyReducibleNodes(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">    removeFromCurrentSet(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">    OptimallyReducibleNodes.insert(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">    G.getNodeMetadata(NId).setReductionState(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeMetadata::OptimallyReducible);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> moveToConservativelyAllocatableNodes(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">    removeFromCurrentSet(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">    ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.insert(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">    G.getNodeMetadata(NId).setReductionState(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeMetadata::ConservativelyAllocatable);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> moveToNotProvablyAllocatableNodes(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">    removeFromCurrentSet(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">    NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.insert(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    G.getNodeMetadata(NId).setReductionState(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> setup() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set up worklists.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NId : G.nodeIds()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (G.getNodeDegree(NId) &lt; 3)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">        moveToOptimallyReducibleNodes(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (G.getNodeMetadata(NId).isConservativelyAllocatable())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">        moveToConservativelyAllocatableNodes(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">        moveToNotProvablyAllocatableNodes(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute a reduction order for the graph by iteratively applying PBQP</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reduction rules. Locally optimal rules are applied whenever possible (R0,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// R1, R2). If no locally-optimal rules apply then any conservatively</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocatable node is reduced. Finally, if no conservatively allocatable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node exists then the node with the lowest spill-cost:degree ratio is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// selected.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;GraphBase::NodeId&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopstrengthreduce-cpp/#a6d827fc34f1b4371a0b7183d3ca5bcac">reduce</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!G.empty() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot reduce empty graph.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">GraphBase::NodeId</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;NodeId&gt; NodeStack;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Consume worklists.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!OptimallyReducibleNodes.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NItr = OptimallyReducibleNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId = &#42;NItr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">        OptimallyReducibleNodes.erase(NItr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeStack.push&#95;back(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (G.getNodeDegree(NId)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp/#a8e8a0cd1e0e21531b3b6cf88878ee77b">applyR1</a>(G, NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 2:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp/#a7d21d6d08fe746df3e5621b4703523ea">applyR2</a>(G, NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">: <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Not an optimally reducible node.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conservatively allocatable nodes will never spill. For now just</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// take the first node in the set and push it on the stack. When we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// start optimizing more heavily for register preferencing, it may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// would be better to push nodes with lower &#39;expected&#39; or worst-case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register costs first (since early nodes are the most</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constrained).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NItr = ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId = &#42;NItr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">        ConservativelyAllocatableNodes.erase(NItr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeStack.push&#95;back(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">        G.disconnectAllNeighborsFromNode(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NItr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b1373fa0f76edbe1c0999d7d207c9c4">llvm::min&#95;element</a>(NotProvablyAllocatableNodes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                   SpillCostComparator(G));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> NId = &#42;NItr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">        NotProvablyAllocatableNodes.erase(NItr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeStack.push&#95;back(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">        G.disconnectAllNeighborsFromNode(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeStack;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">SpillCostComparator &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">    SpillCostComparator(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a34eec38b7af10d85a3fb2ee8b50aea38">Graph</a>&amp; G) : G(G) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> operator()(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> N1Id, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/regalloc/regallocsolverimpl/#a882a5d143fa147a161f2f7e12543622e">NodeId</a> N2Id) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp/#a7bb13d1dd9c69a2a9350ca5ba163a715">PBQPNum</a> N1SC = G.getNodeCosts(N1Id)&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp/#a7bb13d1dd9c69a2a9350ca5ba163a715">PBQPNum</a> N2SC = G.getNodeCosts(N2Id)&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (N1SC == N2SC)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> G.getNodeDegree(N1Id) &lt; G.getNodeDegree(N2Id);</Highlight></CodeLine>
